## Path.convertToSlashes() method

Replaces Windows-style backslashes with POSIX-style slashes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static convertToSlashes(inputPath: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  inputPath | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
